courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing including chords, strumming patterns, and simple melodies to kickstart your musical journey.

courses.title: Digital Painting for Beginners
courses.description: Explore the world of digital art using tools like Procreate and Photoshop. Learn brushes, lighting, and color composition.

courses.title: Piano Masterclass
courses.description: Take your piano skills to the next level with advanced techniques, music theory, and performance tips.

courses.title: Watercolor Landscapes
courses.description: Master the art of watercolor painting by learning techniques to capture skies, trees, and serene landscapes.

courses.title: Advanced Music Production
courses.description: Dive into advanced mixing, mastering, and sound design techniques using Ableton and Logic Pro.

courses.title: Sketching and Figure Drawing
courses.description: Learn sketching fundamentals and figure proportions using pencil and charcoal to create expressive human forms.

courses.title: Violin for Beginners
courses.description: Start playing the violin from scratch. Learn posture, bowing techniques, and your first melodies.

courses.title: Abstract Art Exploration
courses.description: Express yourself freely with colors and textures. Understand abstract art theory and experiment with mixed media.
